body_html:
Oh, I didn't realize that.
…
On Wed, Aug 23, 2017 at 1:40 PM, Anthony Platanios ***@***.*** > wrote: @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> I'm currently doing that at the Scala side. I was just wondering why it's not done on the C side for the eager API, but it is done for the standard op creation API (i.e., for symbolic execution). — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. -- - Alex

body:
Oh, I didn't realize that.

On Wed, Aug 23, 2017 at 1:40 PM, Anthony Platanios <notifications@github.com
> wrote:

> @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> I'm currently doing that at the Scala
> side. I was just wondering why it's not done on the C side for the eager
> API, but it is done for the standard op creation API (i.e., for symbolic
> execution).
>
> —
